frame.name: SUS
frame.subtitle: Social Deduction Game
frame.description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players bet and try to identify the Traitor among them. Work together to find the impostor, or be the one who takes it all!
frame.ogTitle: SUS - Social Deduction Game on Base
frame.ogDescription: Play SUS - a multiplayer social deduction game where players bet and hunt for traitors. Winners split the prize, traitors can take it all!
